thread.title: Doing This 1 Thing at McDonald's Will Guarantee You Fresh Fries Every Time
thread.title_full: Doing This 1 Thing at McDonald's Will Guarantee You Fresh Fries Every Time

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Doing This 1 Thing at McDonald's Will Guarantee You Fresh Fries Every Time
text:
It's no secret that McDonald's fries aren't always made to order, and there's a chance you could be eating fries that have been sitting out for a while before they get to you. A secret you might not know, though, is that there's a way to get fresh fries every. Single. Time.
All you have to do is ask for fries without salt. That's it. ~*LiFe HaCK*~.
 FoodBeast found this gem-of-a-hack in a Quora thread where McDonald's employees shared all of their McDonald's secrets.
The tip comes from Mackenzie Shelton who wrote, "If you want fresh fries, order them sans salt. This ensures that we have to make a new batch, just for you. You could also request a fresh batch and you're likely to have good luck there, too. This same trick works for a Filet-O-Fish ordered without the cheese."
There you have it. If you want fresh AF, and crunchy, not soggy, fries, ask for them without salt. And then add your own salt immediately because salty fries ♥️♥️.
For more food news and magical recipes, follow Cosmo Bites on Facebook !
Follow Danielle on Instagram and Twitter .
